abstract: New York Police Dept says Egyptian college student who reported being  slashed in Lower Manhattan by man who called her terrorist fabricated story; woman, whose name is not released, will not be criminally charged but will undergo psychiatric evaluation.
lead_paragraph: The woman, a student from Egypt, claimed that a man calling her a terrorist attacked her; the authorities say she has emotional issues and will not be charged.

headline.main: Police Say Woman Lied About Slashing in Manhattan
headline.print_headline: Authorities Say  Woman Lied  About Slashing

snippet: The woman, a student from Egypt, claimed that a man calling her a terrorist attacked her; the authorities say she has emotional issues and will not be charged.
